introduction:
=== Welcome to DataShell ===
Type 'exit' to quit
---------------------------

alias.insert: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO alias (name, cmd) VALUES (?, ?);

alias.err:
[ERROR] Invalid alias format.
[USAGE] alias <name>=<command>
Hint: alias must be a single argument, e.g. alias bio='set bio'
Type 'help alias' for more information.

unalias.err:
[ERROR] Invalid unalias format.
[USAGE] unalias <name>
Hint: you must supply the alias name to remove.
Type 'help unalias' for more information.
